      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        initializes the stage. sets the min width of view components and inits the projects, user, todo and settings list. also attaches click handlers to the list components.

      • _initSettingsList

        private void _initSettingsList()
        inits the settings list. Settings are added using Strings. The pattern is used like this: TemplateName = Test ViewFile: "edge/views/settings/test.fxml Controller: "TestSettingsController.java"

      • _initUserList

        protected void _initUserList()
        inits the user list warning suppressed because we can't really predict Hibernate therefore the List<E> can't be parameterized.
